messages.title: WE'RE BACKING DANNY
messages.content: While Danny is delivering for our Highland communities the Nationalists are letting the Highlands, centralising our services, and not investing in much needed local infrastructure.

endorsements.endorsement: While Danny is delivering for our Highland communities the Nationalists are letting the Highlands, centralising our services, and not investing in much needed local infrastructure.

endorsements.endorser: Bill Smith, Former Provost for Inverness
endorsements.endorsement: Danny's knowledge and experience is essential for bringing in investment, and continuing to develop the Highlands.
Danny is a local champion who has worked hard to support our area and help his constituents.
Danny is always there to help people when they need it. He makes a huge difference helping local people.
Danny is a strong local voice for us all.
Danny gave us his full support to provide better care in our local care home.
Danny has worked tirelessly, helping me try to claim my pension through the ombudsman.
Danny helped our daughter-in-law with a pregnancy visa under the old law, so we could see our grandson.

quotes.text: I want to thank Danny for all his work on energy surcharges.
Delighted to see you're still voicing hard words on the voice of us Highlanders.
I'm delighted at the outcome, thank you.
We cannot thank you enough for your effort and commitment. From all in Fort Augustus.
